column5: AUPH I still think we see the SP coil down to 615 625 before it shoots higher The trading pattern on this stock since its inception is that it likes to coil before any significant move higher Take this with a grain of salt Its just my observation from past trading patterns I personally am not trading this stockIve already backed up the truck and am waiting for a buyout

AUPH Although there are serious cracks in ILJINs story I personally dont have such a negative sentiment for them Im fine with the current board but its also true that relationships on boards can and do get very cosy over time and remember there can also be a negative twist to board members BP history I think their action will make the board more cautious because they can repeat the same show next year I think theyve overdone it this time with 3 new people but maybe that was the whole purpose of it and their only goal Cheers

AUPH He stated to me Greenleaf is all about preparing AUPH to get VOC to market and further the value of the other indications He also feels strong about increasing share holder value Really no new information for us longs but a refreshing change of attitude in keeping All share holders better informed Thanks again Glenn

AUPH Talked to Glenn Schulman yesterday great conversation He is making a real effort to reach out to ALL share holders to communicate the companys direction and answer any questions This is a nice change from previous IR departmentThanks GlennHe conveyed to me they are perplexed by ILJIN move and the timing of such a move As Neil mentioned earlier ILJIN vetted Greenleaf before his acceptance So my thoughtwhy not give him some time to implement change We talked about the additional extended study that was implemented by AUPH not required by the FDA He was not 100 sure why Glickman implemented the study but felt like this would help during the label phase of FDA approval He also said that about 80 of patients were rolling into the study but was not positive of that number The study is also a blind study
